title: These Rare PCB Colors Are PERFECT for DIY Keyboards

media:group.media:title: These Rare PCB Colors Are PERFECT for DIY Keyboards
media:group.media:description:
Let's look at these awesome rare colours available with PCBWay's Advanced PCB service. These boards looks fantastic and make a great choice for DIY custom keyboards. 

Thanks to my sponsor PCBWay for supporting this video. PCBWay offer PCB fabrication, CNC and 3D Printing and more. They have been super efficient and friendly with all the projects I‚Äôve used them for and I‚Äôm very happy to recommend them. You can use this link to support the channel. https://www.pcbway.com/setinvite.aspx?inviteid=499614

You can order this board from PCBWay  with this direct link: https://www.pcbway.com/project/shareproject/18_Key_Keyboard_The_Piano_2_afbac38f.html

--------------------------------------------------------------------------
Parts list:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Kailh Choc switches (I used the light blue liner ones from https://splitkb.com/products/kailh-low-profile-choc-switches
MBK Blank Keycaps https://splitkb.com/products/blank-mbk-choc-low-profile-keycaps
Hotswap Sockets (Choc) https://splitkb.com/products/kailh-hotswap-sockets
Socket pins (pins only) https://splitkb.com/products/mill-max-low-profile-sockets
Diodes to chop up as DIY socket pins:
Amazon UK: https://amzn.to/3alKTPo
Amazon US: https://amzn.to/3wLcHEg
Full height machine pin sockets https://mechboards.co.uk/products/machine-pin-sockets
Reset button https://www.aliexpress.com/item/33013562004.html (Uses the b3u1000p footprint in my Ergogen fork)
Better version of reset button (matches the footprint better but more expensive) https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005002267741606.html?spm=a2g0o.order_list.0.0.4eef1802z5TqoV
Battery connector (2p curved) https://www.aliexpress.com/item/1005002096347570.html (Uses the bat footprint in my Ergogen fork)
Power switch https://www.aliexpress.com/item/4000685483225.html (Uses the pcm12 footprint in my Ergogen fork)
Nice!nano v2 https://splitkb.com/products/nice-nano or https://mechboards.co.uk/products/nice-nano-v2 
Batteries: https://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/194001009975
